DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , comparative , randomized single surgeon study compare minimally invasive total hip arthroplasty ( MIS ) via anterior approach conventional total hip arthroplasty via anterolateral transgluteal approach .
DOC.brief_title: Study Two Surgical Approaches Total Hip Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose osteoarthritis hip decide undergo total hip arthroplasty Patients willing sign consent form Patient unwilling sign consent form Patient involve another study
DOC.keyword: Evaluate early functional outcome two anterior approach total hip arthroplasty
